entry.string: git config --global user.email jenkins@gosmartlog.com git config --global user.name jenkins git clone https://${BITBUCKET_USERNAME}:${BITBUCKET_PASSWORD}@bitbucket.org/smartlogtms/devops-deployment.git cd devops-deployment sed -i 's+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/swm-fe.*+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/swm-fe@sha256:76098249be3ecf6949590c5d44130b826fb814d8a85a85b3bbcd39f8da204fba+g' ./swm-fe/Release/coyote/.argocd-source.yaml sed -i "s/creationTimestamp:.*/creationTimestamp: '2023-03-19T16:30:46Z'/" ./swm-fe/Release/coyote/.argocd-source.yaml git add ./swm-fe/Release/coyote/.argocd-source.yaml git commit -m 'Done by Jenkins Job changemanifest: swm-fe:16' git push https://${BITBUCKET_USERNAME}:${BITBUCKET_PASSWORD}@bitbucket.org/smartlogtms/devops-deployment.git HEAD:refs/heads/master rm -rf /home/jenkins/agent/workspace/swm-fe_Release/coyote/*
